item.title: Halo 3 beta thread
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:29, topic:93885”][quote author=DeadBird link=topic=136077.msg1355634#msg1355634 date=1179796760]

Halo is the worst game i have EVER played.

I think Half Life is a crappy and boring game.
Do you see me barging in on hermtard fap fests and saying “omgomg hl sux”?
[/quote]
Hush. Did i ask to be mocked and insulted? No.[/quote]
Well with crappy comments like that you are bound to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 beta thread
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“gho5t, post:20, topic:93885”]No more plasma grenades
I loved chucking a 'nade across Lockout to the other tower, then seeing some guy come out of nowhere with a little blue glowing dot on his face. When that happens, all you are thinking is
[cheesy action movie actor voice] I got him [/cheesy action movie actor voice][/quote]
Spike grenade is you.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 beta thread
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“newbiehacker, post:18, topic:93885”]Nintendo wii is like a babies toy. Yeah it’s fun, but look at yourself in the mirror playing it, I do agree that the wii is sexy, but it has the worst specs out of all the current generation of consoles.

PS3 is overpriced and has stupid expensive features which I’d never use, and cost a LOT to produce. (e.g. blue-ray). They’ve been in competition against the 360 since its release, for example the “We have 1080p!”, Microsoft releases update over xbox live thing. At least the 360 gives me an option on what peripherals I have (Admittedly the software can be a bit constrictive, but if you had the IP, wouldn’t you try and protect it?).

So yeah, I <3 360, (and wii, but to a lesser extent [BASEBALL FTW]), but I REALLY hate the PS3.[/quote]

Exactly my thoughts too, i love my 360,and the wii is great and all but not even close to my 360 but I completely think the ps3 is overpriced junk.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 beta thread
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

Nintendo wii is like a babies toy. Yeah it’s fun, but look at yourself in the mirror playing it, I do agree that the wii is sexy, but it has the worst specs out of all the current generation of consoles.

PS3 is overpriced and has stupid expensive features which I’d never use, and cost a LOT to produce. (e.g. blue-ray). They’ve been in competition against the 360 since its release, for example the “We have 1080p!”, Microsoft releases update over xbox live thing. At least the 360 gives me an option on what peripherals I have (Admittedly the software can be a bit constrictive, but if you had the IP, wouldn’t you try and protect it?).

So yeah, I <3 360, (and wii, but to a lesser extent [BASEBALL FTW]), but I REALLY hate the PS3.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 beta thread
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Its pretty nice,just tried it out,Only played a game because i didnt really care too much for it.But for sure it is much better than halo 2…Nice graphics,new nade,new guns,new maps,new format/layout,new vechiles!

but at the same time its like playing the same game with a few minor changes.

Read full topic
